ud8.10:8.2: Chaṭṭhamavaggavaranti → chaṭṭhamavaggavaraṁ (bj, mr) | jaccandho → tu tamandho (mr)
ud8.10:8.4: Pāṭaligāmiyamaṭṭhamavaggo → pāṭaligāmavaraṭṭhamavaggo (bj, mr); pāṭaligāmiyavaraṭṭhamavaggo (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1)
ud8.10:9.4: Addhā hi taṁ udānamitīdamāhu → addhā tamudānamitīdamāhu (bj); saddhā hi taṁ udānantidamāhu (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1); atthāyetaṁ udānamitimāhu (mr)
